testimonial.title: What Developers Say
testimonial.description: Hear from developers who use Gemini CLI Hub

items.name: Alex Chen
items.title: Senior Developer
items.content: Gemini CLI Hub has become my go-to resource for staying updated with the latest developments. The curated content saves me hours of research.

items.name: Sarah Johnson
items.title: AI Engineer
items.content: The expert blogs section is incredibly valuable. I've learned so many advanced techniques that have improved my Gemini CLI projects.

items.name: Mike Rodriguez
items.title: DevOps Engineer
items.content: The tools section helped me discover utilities I never knew existed. My development workflow is now much more efficient.

items.question: What is Gemini CLI Hub?
items.answer: Gemini CLI Hub is a comprehensive resource center providing the latest news, expert blogs, and essential tools for Gemini CLI development.

items.question: Is the content free to access?
items.answer: Yes, all content on Gemini CLI Hub is free to access. We believe in making knowledge accessible to everyone.

items.question: How often is content updated?
items.answer: We update our content daily with the latest news and regularly add new blog posts and tools to our collection.

items.question: Can I contribute content?
items.answer: Absolutely! We welcome contributions from the community. Check our contribution guidelines in the About section.

items.question: Do you have a newsletter?
items.answer: Yes, you can subscribe to our newsletter to receive weekly updates on the latest Gemini CLI developments.
